entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening then changing to periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
